azureCLI.lineContinuationCharacter.descr: Override the default continuation character (backtick [`] on Windows otherwise backslash [\]) used for multiline commands
azureCLI.showResultInNewEditor.descripti: Controls whether showing the result from running an Azure CLI command in an editor should always create a new editor.
